attributes.action: STOP PURINA FROM PRODUCING AND SELLING BAKERS COMPLETE  DOG FOOD IN THE UK
attributes.additional_details:
It is well know that this product has E320,E132,E102,E321,E310,E172,E110,E104,E171,E153,Plus Various Sugars....4% meat .
This  collection of number means tumour producing when fed to rats, links with urticaria, angioedema, ashma, blood disorders methemoglobinemia,skin sensitivity,rash , itching,high blood pressure,breathing problems,abnormal behaviour patterns,kidney damage,carcinogenic if fed to animals.
Please protect our Dogs by Banning This Product.
We Want The Public To Know The True Cost Of Feeding Our Pet Dogs This FOOD
